apiKeyConfigMsg: Kindly configure the API Key in the settings of the Siyuan AI plugin beforehand.
apiKeyInvalidMsg: The API Key is invalid; please verify its correctness.
instructionInputPlaceholder: Enter AI instruction... Shift + Enter for new line, / for commands
pdfParsingInDev: PDF parsing feature is under development...
supportedFileTypes: Only txt, csv, md files are supported currently
answerBasedOnSearch: Based on the above search results, answer the question:
relatedWebPages: Found related web pages as follows
title: Title
knowledgeBasePrompt: You are an AI assistant for the user's knowledge base. Please answer the user's questions based on the retrieved notes content and your knowledge, and include reference links (in markdown format) in your answer. Use [] for content summaries and () for links.
contentCopied: Generated content has been copied to clipboard
summaryPrompt: Summarize the user's input content in concise language.
titleGenerationPrompt: Please do not reply to the user, just generate a short title based on user input [limit to 6 characters, no punctuation marks]
inputPlaceholder: / for commands, Enter to send, Shift + Enter for new line
defaultSystemPrompt: You are a helpful assistant. You can help me by answering my questions. You can also ask me questions.
addTopBarIcon: Add a top bar icon by plugin
confirmRemove: Confirm to delete the data in ${name}?
getTab: Print out all opened custom tabs in the debugger
name: SiYuan

hello.makesure: Before using this template, please read the offical sample, make sure that you've known about the pipeline for plugin developing.
